name: Stud.IP -  Opencast Matterhorn Plugin
tagline: A Stud.IP Plugin for the OpenCast Matterhorn Project
body:
### Stud.IP Opencast
This plugin serves as a connection between Opencast Matterhorn and the LMS Stud.IP.




### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact andre.klassen@elan.ev.de
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
